responses.content:

1. Mark did not buy the blue shirt.
2. If Lisa bought the red shirt, then Mark bought the blue shirt.

If Lisa bought the red shirt, then Mark bought the blue shirt. (From statement 1)
Lisa did not buy the red shirt. (From statement 1)
